result.reason: Screenshot functionality was removed in v1.77.2 (#2011). This request is accepted as an enhancement to restore a simplified 'Take Screenshot' feature with automatic, configurable naming (e.g., ConnectionName_Timestamp) to replace the deprecated manager.
result.approach: Restore the 'Take Screenshot' context menu option in ConnectionTab. Implement logic to capture the screen and automatically save the file to a configured 'Screenshots' directory using a timestamp-based naming pattern.
